items.title: Forget Billions—XRP Could Hit Trillions, Leading Expert Says
items.excerpt: Ripple’s recent moves are drawing new attention after Western Union picked Solana for a USDPT rollout in 2026. According to supporters of XRP, that headline misses a bigger picture: Ripple has been buying firms that touch much larger pools of money. Related R…

items.title: Fed’s $29.4B liquidity boost – Bitcoin bulls, your moment may be coming
items.excerpt: Bitcoin’s Q4 run: Delayed, not denied as Fed liquidity builds.
